# [Interview #582: 4th Age Podcast Interview with Team Jordan, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=582#20)

#### Andrew Gelos

I had one last pronunciation—and unfortunately I had my thing muted at the moment—but is it ah-SHAHN-dah-RYE? (
*ashandarei*
)

#### Maria Simons

ah-SHAHN-dah-RYE.

#### VIRGINIA

Oh! I didn't think of that one. [crosstalk]
